snippet: The administration suggested the group’s conduct will influence a decision on whether to continue its official designation as a terrorist organization.
abstract: Obama administration steps up pressure on Iranian opposition group Mujahedeen Khalq, or People's Mujahedeen, to complete move from Camp Ashraf, its longtime base in Iraq; suggests that the group's conduct will influence a decision on whether to continue its official designation as a terrorist organization.
lead_paragraph: The administration suggested the group’s conduct will influence a decision on whether to continue its official designation as a terrorist organization.

headline.seo: U.S. Presses Iranian Group M.E.K. to Finish Move
headline.main: U.S. Presses Iranian Dissidents to Vacate Camp
headline.print_headline: U.S. Presses Iranian Dissidents to Vacate Camp
